format: A data frame containing 40 observations on 5 ship types in 4 vintages and 2 service periods.

parameters.construction:
factor with levels "1960-64", "1965-69", "1970-74", 
"1975-79" for the periods of construction,
parameters.type: factor with levels "A" to "E" for the different ship types,
parameters.operation:
factor with levels "1960-74", "1975-79" for the periods of
operation,

title: Ship Accidents
reference:
The data are from McCullagh and Nelder (1989, p. 205, Table 6.2) and were
also used by Greene (2003, Ch. 21), see below.
